products.title: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: Comfortable over-ear headphones with crystal clear sound and deep bass.

products.title: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
products.description: Insulated water bottle that keeps your drinks cold for 24 hours.

products.title: Yoga Mat
products.description: Non-slip yoga mat with extra cushioning for comfort during workouts.

products.title: LED Desk Lamp
products.description: Adjustable LED desk lamp with touch control and multiple brightness levels.

products.title: Electric Toothbrush
products.description: Rechargeable electric toothbrush with multiple brushing modes.

products.title: Smartphone Tripod
products.description: Lightweight, portable tripod for smartphones with adjustable height.

products.title: Running Shoes
products.description: Comfortable running shoes designed for long-distance running.

products.title: Wireless Mouse

products.title: Bluetooth Speaker

products.title: Air Purifier
products.description: Air purifier with HEPA filter to remove allergens and improve air quality.

reviews.comment: Great sound quality, but a bit tight around the ears.
Keeps water cold all day! Perfect for hiking.
Good quality mat, but could be a little thicker.
Very bright and adjustable. Perfect for studying.
Battery life is shorter than expected, but cleans well.
